subject: SIMSONN NEW PRO load cell sensor.
description_text:
>
> HI, I own SIMSONN NEW PRO pedals and my brake sensor is not working
> properly. Where can I get a new sensor?
> Thx

conversations.body_text: Hi，Peter Vlcek，     You can purchase the pressure sensor through the link below.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hi, Where can i buy a STM32-control box?
Thx

ut 11. 11. 2025 o 10:01 service@simsonn.com
Hi Peter Vlček,    You can purchase this control box.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black?variant=51434114875706

Will this work with SIMSONN NEW PRO pedals? Thx




pi 14. 11. 2025 o 8:53 service@simsonn.com
Hi Peter Vlček,    Yes, SIMSONN PRO pedals are compatible with the latest Plus X pedals control box and can also used with Haptics.

Hi. The load cell sensor works fine. The reason for my problems is the
sensor holder.It only worked for one year.
 Where can I get a new one? THX



pi 14. 11. 2025 o 11:26 service@simsonn.com 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Hi Peter Vlček,    Please provide your order number and we shall attend to this matter for you. Do not worry.

The pedals were purchased via Aliexpress  Order ID:   3032252142191509.

Could you send the side parts from the Pro plus pedals with 6 mm fix
plate???  Thx

ut 18. 11. 2025 o 9:52 service@simsonn.com

Will the side parts from the Pro plus pedals with 6 mm fix plate be on
that link??? Or will it be the whole pedal? The pedal in the picture
is not a brake pedal.


ut 18. 11. 2025 o 10:13 General and sales enquiries

Hallo https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005010247669718.html. So what
do I get on this link? The price seems pretty high to me for 3 pieces
of metal.


ut 18. 11. 2025 o 10:13 General and sales enquiries

Hello. Can you help me faster? I can't use my pedals!!! Thx
